personalInfo.name: Achmad Musyaffa Taufiqi
personalInfo.title: FullStack Developer
personalInfo.summary: FullStack Developer with 4+ years of experience in modern JavaScript frameworks, backend technologies, and UI/UX design. Passionate about creating responsive, user-friendly web applications with clean code and performance optimization. Strong skills in React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript.

experiences.position: Man to Machine Product Development Engineer
experiences.description: Working on the development of Man to Machine products focusing on frontend technologies and microservice architecture.
achievements: Developed responsive web applications using React.js and TypeScript following best practices and design patterns
Implemented RESTful APIs and microservices using Laravel for improved scalability and maintainability
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet business requirements
Implemented CI/CD pipelines to streamline the development and deployment processes

experiences.description: Worked in a remote agile environment developing full-stack web applications with modern technologies.
achievements: Developed and maintained scalable web applications using React.js for frontend and Golang/Node.js for backend services
Translated UI/UX design wireframes into responsive and pixel-perfect interfaces using modern frontend technologies
Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services to enhance application functionality

experiences.description: Specialized in enterprise software development focusing on eProcurement solutions for large organizations.
achievements: Designed and developed an enterprise-grade eProcurement web application using Angular for frontend and Java for backend services
Implemented complex business logic based on client requirements and industry best practices
Developed integration layers between eProcurement systems and SAP using Java, ensuring seamless data flow between systems
Optimized application performance through code refactoring and improved database queries, reducing page load times

education.description: GPA: 3.86/4.0 | Specialization in Software Development | Participated in Narotama Language Club and Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions | Key courses: Algorithms, Data Structures, Web Development, Database Management, Network Security
Focus on practical software programming, web development, and networking fundamentals | Completed capstone project implementing network infrastructure solutions
